name: Tourpler
body:
# Tourpler - Tour Planner

Tourpler is a open source tour planner. It provides a simple dashboard
and uses Google Maps for planning and displaying upcoming trips.


## Feature

* displaying and planning tours with Google Maps
* user managment
* comments and ticket system

## Install

### Dependency 

* Java
* Play Framework

### Debian/Ubuntu

**Install Java runtime environment:**  
````sudo aptitude install jre-default````

**Install Play Framework:**  
Download it from http://www.playframework.com/download  
````unzip play-2.2.3.zip````  
````export PATH="$PATH:/path/to/play-2.2.3/"````

**Install and run Tourpler:**  
````cd /path/to/tourpler/````  
````play run````

Changelog
---------

> 05/21/2014 - Alpha version 0.0.1
>> Create and display route
>> Single admin login

> 05/19/2014 - Initial commit
